name: Burn Notice (pinkemma)
description:
A small game made for Ludum Dare 51. The theme was "every 10 seconds" and, like many, I went for a game where something happens every 10 seconds.

In the case of Burn Notice you are a small truck that needs to keep the package in the delivery area, but only after unlocking it. 

However, to make it not too easy on you, every 10 seconds the Burn happens from a random location, and you will need to shield your little truck from it behind pillars casting shadows over the arena.
